column1: If you love Lemonade (and if you don't my next question would be: What in the world is wrong with you?) then you will need this album.

column2: An artistic wonder. Bey has seriously outdone herself with this one.
An artistic wonder. Bey has seriously outdone herself with this one.
Lyrically her most RAW and open album yet. AMAZING!
On repeat at my house right now.
Why do they sell this here?
Only downfall is getting it on. Hardest struggle in my life! Other than that absolutely love it.
